short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix some style "issues" on Jira boards and cards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is just an early release of the expansion!

Currently, it can: 
1. Edit the appearance of labels on the Kanban board. In the extension itself, you can select a specific color for each label and share your settings.
2. Show the comment of Flag
3. Add dark theme to old version of jira
